# Repos_With_Most_Stars <img src="https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/1013a74a-d6aa-48ea-967a-164457c826b9/devnwkg-47e46520-6f7c-40cf-a131-e6ee37e888ee.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..HrygeOinS7mqQKQrCDV8FDWbuADSVww68IBcxiSvjR0" height="50px" width="auto">
This is a Flask App that allows the user to search for top repositories (based on the number of ‚≠ê's) in the programming language they choose to query for, using the <a href="https://docs.github.com/en/rest/search"> Github Search API </a>.
